patthana15.76:4.1: Saraṇaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:5.1: Araṇaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.76:6.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:7.1: Saraṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:8.1: Araṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana15.76:9.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:10.1: Saraṇaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.76:10.2: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
